title: Newly Renovated 3 Bedroom 1 Bath in Braintree
posting_body: Get your hands on this beautifully renovated apartment in the perfect location on the Braintree/Weymouth Line.
Enter a stunning open concept living space with high vaulted ceilings and exposed beams.

The large kitchen with peninsula bar is the perfect setup for hosting get togethers, and the stainless and black appliances are a tasteful compliment to the white shaker cabinets and black granite countertops.
New hardwood floors add a beautiful natural warmth throughout the entire unit.
The main level also features a large bedroom with its own decorative fireplace.
Off the kitchen you will also find the immaculate white tiled full bathroom with a closet for the stackable washer & dryer.
Upstairs are 2 more bedrooms with closets and an additional closet between the rooms.
With 2 off-street parkings spaces in the buildings parking lot, this is the perfect location and setup for commuting to the city whether you drive or take the MBTA.
Fill out this form to set up a tour: https://forms.gle/sHELFxsLppAJWe858 (you may need to copy and paste link into address bar)
